articles.title: Watching Netflix for 30 mins harms planet as much as driving 6 kms, finds green report - India Today
articles.description: The report by scientists at the prestigious Royal Society in the UK had revealed that HD video streaming on a smartphone generates about eight times more emissions than standard definition (SD).
articles.content: We all know that how harmful are cars to the plant because they emit carbon monoxide and other toxins. But did you know that binging your favorite series on Netflix for close to an hour is equally ha… [+2013 chars]
